name: Fernando Martinez
title: FullStack Engineer
tagline: With a knack for modular design
about1: Hi, I'm Fernando, a highly motivated software engineer with more than six years of experience in programming. I'm a fan of a good challenge and I love clean, modern and minimal interfaces. Check out my work & experience.
about2: In my free time, you can find me running, cycling or probably doing some crazy adrenaling-pumping activity. I'm also a hunter for cool travel destinations that I post on Tripkii.com.
jobCurDesc: Design, code and implement web applications for several projects using JAVASCRIPT, LAMP and .NET stacks. Engineer backend systems to support previously mentioned applications. Create, support and maintain EC2 instances in Amazon AWS for different stacks. Develop custom front-end HTML, CSS, Javascript & Wordpress sites. Configure domain names, email and hosting through several companies like Amazon, InMotion, NameCheap, GoDaddy. Communicate effectively with clients to deliver quality software projects.
jobPrevDesc: Analyze, code & develop web applications in .NET for projects in the range of 200-400k. Research & solve an average of 50+ IT problems for service request and production support of web applications on a weekly basis. Create test plans and flow charts for specific projects.
eduTitle: Bachelor of Business Administration in MIS (2005 => 2010)
college: C.T. Bauer College of Business, University of Houston
